entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023
